SEARCH
Package com.swer348

Class Section

java.lang.Object
com.ehab.urs.Section
public class Section extends Object
The `Section` class represents a section of a course in an educational institution. It contains information about the section, including the course, instructor, students, and lectures.
Since:
2023-12-01
Version:
1.0
Author:
Ehab, Maamoun
